details.description: Contact details for your pension centre to make an enquiry about State Pension claims and Pension Credit claims
details.more_information:
If you're in Northern Ireland send queries to the [Department for Social Development.](http://www.dsdni.gov.uk/index/ssa/customer-information/ssa_phone_services.htm "Department for Social Development phone services"){:rel="external"}

^Find out how to [contact The Pension Service](/contact-pension-service "Contact the Pension Service") with other enquiries.^
details.introduction: Look up contact details for your pension centre to make an enquiry about State Pension and Pension Credit claims.

details.description: Includes calculating State Pension, eligibility, claiming and deferring
Includes holidays and finding a job
Pension Credit is extra money for pensioners to bring your weekly income up to a minimum amount -  what you'll get, apply, eligibility
How to get and claim your State Pension - forecast/calculator, State Pension age and Additional State Pension
The Pension Service helps with State Pension eligibility, claims, payments and complaints
